00033 const unsigned vtk_pixel_order[] = { 0, 1, 3, 2 };
00034 
00035 const unsigned vtk_voxel_order[] = { 0, 1, 3, 2, 4, 5, 7, 6 };
00036 
00037 const unsigned vtk_wedge_order[] = { 0, 2, 1,   // bottom corners
00038                                      3, 5, 4,   // top corners
00039                                      8, 7, 6,   // bottom edges
00040                                     12,14,13,   // lateral edges
00041                                     11,10, 9,   // top edges
00042                                     17,16,15 }; // quadrilateral faces
00043 
00044 const unsigned vtk_hex_order[] = { 0,  1,  2,  3, // corners (same)
00045                                    4,  5,  6,  7,
00046                                    8,  9, 10, 11, // mid-edge (top before lateral)
00047                                   16, 17, 18, 19,
00048                                   12, 13, 14, 15,
00049                                   22, 21, 23, 20, // mid-face (mixed up) & mid-region (same)
00050                                   24, 25, 26 };

00087       { 0,                        34, MIXED,         0, 0 }

00089 
00090 const unsigned typeInfoListLen = sizeof(typeInfoList)/sizeof(typeInfoList[0]);
00091 
00092 const unsigned reverseIndexList[][3] = {
00093   {  0,  0,  0 }, // 0
00094   {  0,  0,  0 }, // 1
00095   {  0,  0,  0 }, // 2
00096   {  0,  0,  0 }, // 3
00097   {  0,  0,  0 }, // 4
00098   {  0,  0,  0 }, // 5
00099   {  0,  0,  0 }, // 6
00100   {  7,  0,  0 }, // POLYGON
00101   {  5, 22,  0 }, // TRIANGLE
00102   {  9, 23, 28 }, // QUADRILATERAL
00103   {  0,  0,  0 }, // POLYHEDRON
00104   { 10, 24,  0 }, // TETRAHEDRON
00105   { 12, 25, 29 }, // HEXAHEDRON
00106   { 13, 26,  0 }, // PRISM
00107   { 14, 27,  0 }, // PYRAMID
00108   {  0,  0,  0 }, // SEPTAHEDRON
00109   {  0,  0,  0 } };

00111 const VtkTypeInfo* VtkTypeInfo::find_type( unsigned vtk_type, MsqError& err )
00112 {
00113   if (vtk_type >= typeInfoListLen)
00114   {
00115     MSQ_SETERR(err)("Type out of bounds", MsqError::INVALID_ARG);
00116     return 0;
00117   }
00118   
00119   return &typeInfoList[vtk_type];
00120 }
00121 
00122 const VtkTypeInfo* VtkTypeInfo::find_type( EntityTopology msq_type,
00123                                            unsigned num_nodes,
00124                                            MsqError& err )
00125 {
00126   if      ( typeInfoList[ reverseIndexList[msq_type][0] ].numNodes == num_nodes )
00127     return &typeInfoList[ reverseIndexList[msq_type][0] ];
00128   else if ( typeInfoList[ reverseIndexList[msq_type][1] ].numNodes == num_nodes )
00129     return &typeInfoList[ reverseIndexList[msq_type][1] ];
00130   else if ( typeInfoList[ reverseIndexList[msq_type][2] ].numNodes == num_nodes )
00131     return &typeInfoList[ reverseIndexList[msq_type][2] ];
00132  
00133   if (msq_type == POLYGON && num_nodes >= 3 && num_nodes <= 12)
00134     return &typeInfoList[ reverseIndexList[msq_type][0] ];
00135 
00136 
00137   MSQ_SETERR(err)(MsqError::UNSUPPORTED_ELEMENT, "VTK file does not support element type %d with %u nodes", (int)msq_type, num_nodes  );
00138   return 0;
00139 }
00140 
00141 void VtkTypeInfo::mesquiteToVtkOrder( std::vector<size_t>& conn_list ) const
00142 {
00143   assert(conn_list.size() == numNodes);
00144   if (vtkConnOrder)
00145   {
00146     std::vector<size_t> temp_list(numNodes);
00147     std::swap( temp_list, conn_list );
00148     for (size_t i = 0; i < numNodes; ++i)
00149       conn_list[vtkConnOrder[i]] = temp_list[i];
00150   }
00151 }
00152
